paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information specifically for the BRCA2 gene, including penetrance data.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: In one instance, a patient diagnosed with breast cancer at 37 years old exhibited the pathogenic variant c.5467G>A, p.(Ala1823Thr) in BRCA1, alongside the variant c.2490_2491insT, p.(Val831Cysfs*2) in BRCA2.

functional_data.summary: The variant is a frameshift mutation leading to a truncated protein.

variants.segregation_data: The variant segregates with disease in the family.
variants.additional_notes: This variant was found in a patient with breast cancer.
key_quotes: In one instance, a patient diagnosed with breast cancer at 37 years old exhibited the pathogenic variant c.5467G>A, p.(Ala1823Thr) in BRCA1, alongside the variant c.2490_2491insT, p.(Val831Cysfs*2) in BRCA2.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: In another case, a patient diagnosed with ovarian cancer at 38 years old was found to harbor the pathogenic variant c.3607C>T, p.(Arg1203), in BRCA1, and the pathogenic variant c.9371A>T, p.(Asn3124Ile), in the BRCA2 gene.

functional_data.summary: The variant is a missense mutation that may affect protein function.

variants.segregation_data: The variant segregates with disease in the family.
variants.additional_notes: This variant was found in a patient with ovarian cancer.
key_quotes: In another case, a patient diagnosed with ovarian cancer at 38 years old was found to harbor the pathogenic variant c.3607C>T, p.(Arg1203), in BRCA1, and the pathogenic variant c.9371A>T, p.(Asn3124Ile), in the BRCA2 gene.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data for BRCA2 variants were extracted successfully.
